name: Spinner (johnCavatelli)
description:
For thousands of years, the Top of Life has spun on top of Top Tower. But a mysterious evil has cursed the tower, and as the Top's sworn protector, you must race to save the top before it topples over.  At your disposal is a legendary jump-disc, which you can throw down anywhere to jump off of.

Controls: WASD to move, mouse to look, left mouse to use jump disc.

This game was created for the 1-Up game jam using the theme: Get to the top.
